title: Bipartisan tax deal can pave the way for longer term improvements in 2025
description: The economic surge following the initial passage of the 2017 tax cuts package is proof the strategy works. The immediate expensing for capital equipment, for example, was a game-changer.

title: Cal State faculty start strike at largest US public university system
description: California State University faculty began a strike Monday, leaving the country’s largest public university system at a standstill as students return for the spring semester. University professors, counselors, librarians, lecturers and coaches at the system’s 23 campuses, members of the California Faculty Association union, staged a five-day walkout over demands for higher wages and benefits.…

title: Haley looks to beat odds in New Hampshire showdown with Trump
description: MANCHESTER, N.H. — Nikki Haley is looking to beat the odds in New Hampshire on Tuesday as she gets the one-on-one contest with former President Trump she’s long relished in the Republican presidential primary. The Hill’s Decision Desk HQ average shows Haley trailing Trump 47.6 percent to 35.9 percent in New Hampshire, underlining the difficult race she…

title: Dean Phillips: Fake robocalls in NH highlight need for regulation
description: Rep. Dean Phillips (D-Minn.) on Monday denounced an AI-generated robocall in New Hampshire that impersonated President Biden and encouraged voters not to cast ballots in Tuesday’s primary. The Democratic presidential candidate called the robocall “wrong” and said the incident highlights the need for regulating artificial intelligence. “Artificial Intelligence, already surrounding us. It is coming at…

title: Mark Kelly says he’s tested positive for COVID ‘after four years of avoiding it’
description: Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Ariz.) announced Monday he tested positive for COVID-19, which is expected to sideline him from votes for at least several days. “Unfortunately, after four years of avoiding it, I’ve got COVID-19. I’m feeling alright and look forward to returning to the Senate for votes as soon as I can,” he said on…

title: Maxine Waters presses Meta on crypto exchange plans

title: US, UK step up strikes on Houthis
description: The U.S. and United Kingdom conducted another round of large-scale air and missile strikes on Houthi militant targets across Yemen on Monday, according to the Pentagon. U.S. and U.K. military took “proportionate and necessary strikes” against eight Houthi targets in Yemen, including an underground storage site and locations associated with the rebel group’s missile and air surveillance capabilities, according to a…

title: Haley raises $500K in 24 hours post-DeSantis exit

Ron DeSantis (R) dropped out of the presidential race.  The development comes just one day before the New Hampshire primary where Haley is looking to take on former President Trump…

title: Trump says he’d beat Haley in a cognitive test

title: FTC: TurboTax maker deceived customers with ‘free’ services

title: Navy identifies SEALs presumed dead in Gulf of Aden mission
description: The U.S. Navy on Monday identified the two SEALs who are presumed dead after after they went missing off the coast of Somalia earlier this month during a mission to seize Iranian missile components headed to Houthi rebels in Yemen. The sailors were Navy Special Warfare Operator 1st Class Christopher J. Chambers, 37, and Navy…

title: Crisis in the Taiwan Strait likely in 2024, experts say
description: A majority of experts believe a crisis in the Taiwan strait is likely in 2024, with a Chinese blockade or “quarantine” of the island seen as the most likely scenario.   That’s according to a new survey from the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS), which asked 87 leading U.S. and Taiwanese experts on…

title: Texas petitioned at United Nations over laws targeting LGBTQ communities
description: At least seven laws passed by Texas legislators and signed by the governor last year target LGBTQ people in violation of federal and international human rights law, four LGBTQ advocacy groups wrote Monday in a petition to the United Nations. The groups in a joint letter of allegation submitted Monday to 17 independent experts, working groups and…

title: South Africa’s criminal case against Israel is a sham
description: The world must stand up to avoid another atrocity against the state of Israel and the Jewish people.

title: Vast majority of voters back Israel over Hamas: Poll
description: An overwhelming majority of voters say they support Israel over Hamas in their ongoing war, according to a poll released Monday. The Harvard CAPS-Harris poll found that 80 percent of respondents said they supported Israel over Hamas in the conflict, compared to 20 percent who said they sided with Hamas more.   That level of support…

title: With Trump’s help, the resurrection of Ron DeSantis begins today
description: Were Trump not in the 2024 contest, I believe DeSantis would have been the best Republican candidate.

title: Expect the expected from a second Biden or Trump term
description: A lot of Americans will hope the nation can survive until 2028.

description: Dwight D. Eisenhower set the Republican Party on a different course that paid political dividends.

description: The White House on Monday unveiled new steps from the administration to ensure access to contraception, emergency abortions at hospitals and abortion medication.  President Biden will also meet with his reproductive rights task force on Monday, the fourth time the group of senior officials has met since its formation. title: Supreme Court lets stand ex-Hunter Biden associate Devon Archer’s criminal conviction
description: The Supreme Court on Monday let stand former Hunter Biden business associate Devon Archer’s criminal conviction, rejecting for a second time Archer’s bid to avoid prison. title: Supreme Court will hear appeals of death row inmate Richard Glossip
description: The Supreme Court will hear the appeals of Richard Glossip, a death row inmate whose execution was blocked by the high court in May following intense scrutiny over whether he received a fair trial.  Glossip has been in prison for almost 25 years after being convicted of paying another man, Justin Sneed, to commit the…

title: Trump miscues have Dems seeking to turn tables on GOP over age, mental fitness

title: Two missing Navy SEALs lost off coast of Somalia believed dead
